components.title: ./components/BarStacked.svelte
components.contents:
<script>
  import { getContext } from 'svelte';
  import { scaleOrdinal } from 'd3-scale';

  export let seriesColors;

  const { data, xGet, yGet, yScale, custom } = getContext('LayerCake');

  $: columnWidth = d => {
    const xVals = $xGet(d);
    return xVals[1] - xVals[0];
  };

  $: colorScale = scaleOrdinal()
    .domain($custom.seriesNames)
    .range(seriesColors);

</script>

<g class="bar-group">
  {#each $data as series}
    {#each series as d, i}
      <rect
        class='group-rect'
        data-id="{i}"
        x="{$xGet(d)[0]}"
        y="{$yGet(d)}"
        height={$yScale.bandwidth()}
        width="{columnWidth(d)}"
        fill={colorScale(series.key)}
      ></rect>
    {/each}
  {/each}
</g>

components.title: ./components/AxisX.svelte
components.contents:
<script>
  import { getContext } from 'svelte';

  const { width, height, xScale, yScale } = getContext('LayerCake');

  export let gridlines = true;
  export let formatTick = d => d;
  export let baseline = false;
  export let snapTicks = false;
  export let ticks;
  export let tickNumber;

  $: tickVals = ticks || $xScale.ticks(tickNumber);

  function textAnchor(i) {
    if (snapTicks === true) {
      if (i === 0) {
        return 'start';
      }
      if (i === tickVals.length - 1) {
        return 'end';
      }
    }
    return 'middle';
  }
</script>

{#if $xScale}
  <g class='axis x-axis'>
    {#each tickVals as tick, i}
      <g class='tick tick-{ tick }' transform='translate({$xScale(tick)},{$yScale.range()[0]})'>
        {#if gridlines !== false}
          <line y1='{$height * -1}' y2='0' x1='0' x2='0'></line>
        {/if}
        <text y='16' text-anchor='{textAnchor(i)}'>{formatTick(tick)}</text>
      </g>
    {/each}
    {#if baseline === true}
      <line class="baseline" y1='{$height + 0.5}' y2='{$height + 0.5}' x1='0' x2='{$width}'></line>
    {/if}
  </g>
{/if}

<style>
  .tick {
    font-size: .725em;
    font-weight: 200;
  }

  line,
  .tick line {
    stroke: #aaa;
    stroke-dasharray: 2;
  }

  .tick text {
    fill: #666;
  }

  .baseline {
    stroke-dasharray: 0;
  }
</style>

components.title: ./components/AxisYScaleBand.svelte
components.contents:
<script>
  import { getContext } from 'svelte';

  const { xScale, yScale } = getContext('LayerCake');

  export let gridlines = true;
  export let formatTick = d => d;

  $: halfBandwidth = $yScale.bandwidth() / 2;
</script>

<g class='axis y-axis'>
  {#each $yScale.domain() as tick}
    <g class='tick tick-{tick}' transform='translate({$xScale.range()[0]}, {$yScale(tick)})'>
      {#if gridlines !== false}
        <line x2='100%' y1={halfBandwidth} y2={halfBandwidth}></line>
      {/if}
      <text y='{4 + halfBandwidth}' x="-5">{formatTick(tick)}</text>
    </g>
  {/each}
</g>

<style>
  .tick {
    font-size: .725em;
    font-weight: 200;
  }

  .tick line {
    stroke: #aaa;
    stroke-dasharray: 2;
  }

  .tick text {
    fill: #666;
  }

  .tick.tick-0 line {
    stroke-dasharray: 0;
  }

  .y-axis .tick text {
    text-anchor: end;
  }
</style>
